name: SaudiCoffee
description: "Saudi Coffee" is a hyper casual game created during a game development workshop that challenges players to handle a Saudi Coffee pot and pour coffee into cups "finjal" safely. The player controls a "dallah" and must pour and control it to fill the required number of finajel at the end of each level. The game features easy-to-use controls, a retro hand art style, and progressively increasing difficulty. Players can earn points and unlock new settings by collecting stars throughout the levels. With its simple yet addictive gameplay, "Saudi Coffee" is perfect for casual gamers looking for a fun and challenging experience.
